name: Super Cool Duck Game!
description:
A short but quite difficult game made in just 3 days for the Lame Jam 18 game jam.

You feature as a duck who has, after the invasion of your home planet Duckanas by the Goose Empire, infiltrated the Goose Megaship that now holds ransom every Grape in the universe. Your role is to make it through each room of the Megaship and reach past the Goose's Doorstep, of where you can free the stolen grapes.

In order to take out the security turrets that guard the Goose Megaship's innards, you brought an AK-47, which pumps out 10 rounds per second.

Good luck!

Controls:

  • Move - A/D
  • Run - Shift
  • Jump - Space
  • Shoot - Left Click
  • Aim - Towards mouse cursor
  • Pause - Escape
